item.title: Sasha add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "A sense of humor...is superior to any religion so far devised." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Sasha add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Sasha add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Sasha add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Sasha add a quote by Sam Harris
item.description: "The president of the United States has claimed, on more than one occasion, to be in dialogue with God. If he said that he was talking to God through his hairdryer, this would precipitate a national emergency. I fail to see how the addition of a hairdryer makes the claim more ridiculous or offensive." -- Sam Harris

item.title: Sasha add a quote by Jules Renard
item.description: "I don't know if God exists, but it would be better for His reputation if He didn't." -- Jules Renard
